# auxiliary

**Type Property**

The behavior marking this window as auxiliary for both Stage Manager and full screen.

## Declaration

```swift
static var auxiliary: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

Marking a window collection behavior as auxiliary means it becomes auxiliary for both Stage Manager and full screen display modes. Auxiliary windows prefer being shown alongside primary windows.

To set a different behavior in full screen, while keeping Stage Manager auxiliary, set a more specific behavior just for full screen mode (see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/CollectionBehavior-swift.struct/fullScreenNone]).



Use this collection behavior for About or Settings windows as well as utility panes.



## Stage Manager and full screen

- **primary**: The behavior marking this window as primary for both Stage Manager and full screen.
- **canJoinAllApplications**: The behavior marking this window as one that can join all apps for both Stage Manager and full screen.

items.description: The behavior marking this window as primary for both Stage Manager and full screen.
items.name: primary

items.description: The behavior marking this window as one that can join all apps for both Stage Manager and full screen.
